pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Interpretation of Linear Regression Models // Interactive visualization of effects, response functions and marginal effects for different kinds of regression models. In this version linear regression models, generalized linear models, generalized additive models and linear mixed-effects models are supported. Major features are the interactive approach and the handling of the effects of categorical covariates: if two or more factors are used as covariates every combination of the levels of each factor is treated separately. The automatic calculation of marginal effects and a number of possibilities to customize the graphical output are useful features as well.
